meanings.definition: A shortened form of the word 'magazines'.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading zines about art and music.
meanings.sent2: She started creating zines to share her poetry with others.
meanings.sent3: The zines at the bookstore had colorful covers.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with zines, like a mini library.
meanings.sent5: The zines on the shelf caught my eye with their unique designs.

meanings.definition: A publication, typically self-published, that covers a specific topic or interest.
meanings.sent1: Zines on gardening are popular among plant enthusiasts.
meanings.sent2: He decided to make zines about his travels around the world.
meanings.sent3: The zines at the fair showcased quirky recipes and stories.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of zines, each page a different thought.
meanings.sent5: The zines she made were like windows into her creative mind.
